alert.note: Alert for Arlington; City of Alexandria; City of Fairfax; City of Falls Church; Fairfax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 10 at 7:17PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of DC, central Maryland and northern Virginia, including the following counties: in DC, District of Columbia. In central Maryland, Anne Arundel, Montgomery and Prince Georges. In northern Virginia, Arlington, City of Alexandria, City of Fairfax, City of Falls Church and Fairfax. * WHEN...Until 115 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 716 PM EDT, emergency management reported multiple roads closed throughout the greater DC metro. Flooding is ongoing. Between 2.5 and 4.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Arlington... Alexandria... Rockville... Bethesda... Reston... Bowie... Annandale... Olney... Springfield... College Park... Fort Washington... Greenbelt... Fairfax... Langley Park... Beltsville... Vienna... Groveton... Forestville... Falls Church... Huntington... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Arlington; City of Alexandria; City of Fairfax; City of Falls Church; Fairfax
